Peter restaurant is the only place that sells chicken in Tuen Mun (assume there is no other place that Tuen Mun people can go to). The total demand among Tuen Mun people for chicken is Qs(P)=5-P. Peter restaurant can produce one chicken at a constant marginal cost of$1.

(a) What is the market equilibrium without dead weight loss? (where the price is equal to marginal cost).

(b) If Peter is doing monopolistic pricing, what is the monopoly price? And what is the dead-weight loss compared with part (a)?

首先你要轉返做P = 5 - Q
(a)

P = MC
5 - Q = 1
Q = 4
代返入demand curve P = 5 - 4 = 1


(b)
用TR = P x Q去搵返Total revenue function
TR = (5 - Q)Q = 5Q - Q^2
d咗佢就搵到marginal revenue fumction
MR = dTR/dQ = 5 - 2Q

由於MR = MC係maximize profit
所以5 - 2Q = 1
2Q = 4
Q = 2

將Q = 2放返落demand curve, P = 5 - 2 = 3

至於deadweight loss就係三角形面積
(3 - 1)(4 - 2)/2 = 2

利申: 一路搭地鐵一路用手機做, 可能有careless mistake

(c) Now suppose Yuen Long people also go to Peter restaurant. The Yuen Long people’s demand for chicken is Qf (P ) = 11 -1 /2P , where P is the
price per chicken. For simplicity, we assume Peter’s price can not be that high to rule out Tuen Mun people consumption. If Peter cannot distinguish Tuen Mun people and Yuen Long people,what’s Peter optimal price for chicken? (Hint: the aggregated market demand curve has a kink point. So peter’s marginal revenue curve also has a kink point.)

唔該晒

屯門：Q = 5 - P
元朗：Q = 11 - 0.5P

你可以見到當P >= 5，屯門人就唔會幫趁，但係元朗人要去到P >= 22先唔會幫趁。
所以在22 > P >= 5果段範圍，aggregated market demand只會等於元朗人的demand，即係Q = 11 - 0.5P。
至於P > 5，aggregated market demand就等於兩個地區的總和，即係Q = (5 - P) + (11 - 0.5P)
即係Q = 16 - 1.5P


----------------------------------

我們睇咗P >= 5的情況先。

如果我收P >= 5, Q = 11 - 0.5P
跟返上面個做法，
P = 22 - 2Q
TR = (22 - 2Q)Q = 22Q - 2Q^2
MR = 22 - 4Q
MR = MC
22 - 4Q = 1
Q = 5.25
P = 22 - 2(5.25) = 11.5
Profit = (11.5)(5.25) - 5.25 = 55.125

--------------------------------

至於P < 5的情況有點tricky。你唔可以用返上面MR = MC的方法去做。
因為咁樣你會搵到P = 5.83先係profit maximization，但係當P > 5，條market demand function又會唔同咗。

所以P < 5你唔可以用MR = MC去做。你要證明P < 5的時候，profit最大係幾多。
我的做法就係用marginal profit去推論。

首先你將aggregated market demand轉返做P = 16/1.5 - Q/1.5
用TR = P x Q去搵返Total revenue function
TR = (16/1.5 - Q/1.5)Q = 16Q/1.5 - Q^2/1.5
Total cost就等於marginal cost的總和，即係Q。TC = Q
因此profit function = TR - TC = (16Q/1.5 - Q^2/1.5) - Q = 14.5Q/1.5 - Q^2/1.5
將依條式d with respect to Q，就可以搵到marginal profit。
marginal profit = d profit/dQ = 14.5/1.5 - 4Q/3

你可以見到當7.25 > Q，marginal profit就會係positive。
調返轉當Q > 7.25，marginal profit就會係negative。
即使P = 4.99999999，Q = 8.5。
換言之在P > 5依個範圍，Q無可能細過7.25，即係marginal profit一定係negative，即係生產愈多，Profit就會愈細。

所以當P < 5，price愈高就生產愈少，咁就賺得愈多。
所以Profit最大就係P = 4.999999999999, Profit = 34


--------------------------------

比較之下，見到將P定於11.5，賺到的profit仲大($55.125)。所以依個就係答案。
